Schaumburg.AAR Corp:
AAR CORP. is an independent provider of aviation and expeditionary services to the global commercial, government and defense aviation industries.


== General information ==
Founded in 1951, I.A. Allen Industrial Sales was incorporated in 1955, renamed Allen Aircraft Radio in 1962 and became AAR CORP. in 1969. AAR is headquartered in Wood Dale, Illinois, a Chicago suburb near O'Hare International Airport and employs approximately 4,600 people in more than 20 countries around the world.
